snippet: The return to power of the separatist Parti Québécois continued to be overshadowed on Wednesday by a shooting at a victory party in Montreal that killed one man and critically injured another.
abstract: Return to power of the Canadian separatist Parti Quebecois continues to be overshadowed by a shooting at a victory party in Montreal that killed one man and critically injured another; Montreal police say that it is possible that the shooting was an assassination attempt on the party leader, Pauline Marois.
lead_paragraph: The return to power of the separatist Parti Québécois continued to be overshadowed on Wednesday by a shooting at a victory party in Montreal that killed one man and critically injured another.

headline.seo: Two Shot at Victory Party for Separatists in Quebec
headline.main: Quebec Attack May Have Been Assassination Attempt, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Quebec Attack May Have Been Assassination Attempt, Police Say
